seed.name: RNG Seed
seed.description: Set seed for level generation (0 for random)

length.name: Length
length.description: The length of the level generated in m (1 block = 1 m). In JFP, length is measured in meters and height in units.

corridor-rules.name: Corridor Rules
corridor-rules.description: Rules for corridor gen. NSNZ, or No Spam, No Zigzagging, is currently the standard.

corridor-height.name: Corridor Height (units)
corridor-height.description: 1 block = 30 units. In JFP, length is measured in meters and height in units.

active-theme.name: Theme
active-theme.description: The active JFP theme file (.jfpt). Leaving this blank will load no theme.

marks.name: Meter Marks
marks.description: Dashed lines and text marking how far you've currently travelled.

corners.name: Corner Pieces
corners.description: The corners connecting slopes on their edges.

low-vis.name: Low Visibility
low-vis.description: Adds a dark fog to the right of the screen, lowering your FOV.

color-mode.name: Color Mode
color-mode.description:
Basic unthemed color options.
- Washed - washed out random background color
- All Colors - any random background color
- Classic Mode - classic Juggernaut gray color
- Night Mode - black background with bright randomly colored lines
- Random

background-image.name: Background Texture
background-image.description: Background Texture # represents its position on the editor selection screen. Select 0 for a random texture.

fuzzy-spikes.name: Fuzzy Spikes
fuzzy-spikes.description: AKA groud spikes. And yes, they actually do have a hitbox, albeit not a conventional one.

transition-type.name: Size Transition Type
transition-type.description: Type A (default) generates miniwave corridors 1 block wider than big wave corridors, and vice-versa, similarly to Random Wave. Type B generates both with the same corridor height, similarly to CorroZ.

corridor-widening.name: Widen Playfield Bounds
corridor-widening.description: Widen the wave playing field's bounds to the screen edges.

lmao-button.name: LMAO (Primary) Button
lmao-button.description: WiseTree button used to access the JFP main menu.

waveman-button.name: Waveman Button
waveman-button.description: Button for generating JFP levels within your 'created' list.

theming-toolbox.name: Theme Creator Tools
theming-toolbox.description: Popup in the level editor for exporting objects in JFPT block format. Access via a button in the Edit tab.

level-song-source.name: Music Source
level-song-source.description: JFP has a built-in soundtrack of 100+ songs it uses by default. Shuffling from the GD folder can be selected if preferred.

filename.name: File Name
filename.description: The name of the .gmd file saved during waveman. File location: %LOCALAPPDATA%/GeometryDash/
